room_title: Escape room "Secrets of the Abandoned Circus" by International Quests Escape Rooms in Philadelphia
room_description:
On the outskirts of the city stands an abandoned circus. This place used to be so popular that all the performances were sold out months in advance. But then something happened... And the circus was temporarily closed. Some said a young groundskeeper was to blame for the accident, but the police could not find any evidence, and the circus never opened again.
Time passes, but the circus is still surrounded by rumors and gossip. Could it still be inhibited? Maybe it is cursed? You have to follow the trail of clues and unravel the mystery of what happened many years ago and why the circus was closed.
